comment: Two alleged members of the Aryan Brotherhood in Minnesota are arrested after they start a bar fight by assaulting a waitress by lifting her shirt against her will and punching a bouncer trying to defend the waitress.

                                    :op1 "Minnesota")))
                  :ARG2 (m / member

                  :ARG1 (f / fight-01
                        :location (b / bar))
                  :manner (a4 / and
                        :op1 (a5 / assault-01
                              :ARG0 p
                              :ARG1 (p2 / person
                                    :ARG0-of (w / work-01
                                          :ARG2 (w2 / waitress)))
                              :manner (l / lift-01

                                    :ARG4 (a6 / against

                                    :ARG2 (b2 / bouncer))
                              :ARG0-of (t / try-01
                                    :ARG1 (d / defend-01
                                          :ARG0 p
                                          :ARG1 p2)))))))
